title: Update: What Do You Do When Your Kid's Terrible Teacher Is Your Friend?
description:
Her daughter was just assigned her teacher for the upcoming school year, and there's a problem. She knows this teacher isn't good because she taught her son last year. But that's not all. This teacher is also her friend! So what does she do?!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
